description: Off the course, she's missing a leg. In her snowboard pants, she's just Brenna. When her heart races, she transports herself home to the smell of Cajun cooking and sound of her mother’s voice.
title: Before Her Snowboard Hits the Course
title_page: Before Her Snowboard Hits the Course - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Imagine that you’re an Olympic athlete about to compete. How do you calm your nerves? In this series, we take you inside the minds of current and former Olympians as they visualize their dream performance.
